name: An unforgettable date
description:
You wake up in a strange place with a strange looking girl in front of you.

You don't remember how you got there or who you are.

And everything is normal until she starts saying strange things.

Talk to her and try to get to know each other, don't talk at all or just run away from her.

what will you do?

﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌

Features:

-Original Art

-4 endings(10)( each ending with a different gif and text)

-1,560 words

-9 CGS

﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌

credits:

﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌

An unforgettable date It's a small game I made in two weeks to challenge myself because I've wanted to make a VN for a long time and always give up.

﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌
